about.kamra: Instead of relying on music-related theories or reasons, KAMRA creates his very own world based on his sensations and intuition.  His sense of melody was nourished by growing up during the gaming systems craze, and his rhythm was greatly influenced by electronica music.  These two factors form the base of KAMRA’s music.  In 2001, KAMRA was asked to be a part of a music creation team called “invisible designs lab.”  He has since taken part in the creation of music and countless melodies for commercials, games and company sound logos.  Through all these experiences, KAMRA continues to gain new sensations and information also incorporates these into his music.
about.invisidir: “invisi-dir.” is the way or path that the music creative team, invisible designs lab., believes the creative direction should take.  Under the theme of sharing new merits with others, we are planning to proffer new values on music as “invisible designs lab. selection” by producing and making selections.
about.invisibledesignslab: Important things are not visible.  These invisible things have great value--ideas, imagination, and inspiration.  As invisible designs lab., we take these factors and create them into the form of music with new thoughts and expressions.

webcam.title: Webカメラでの体験方法
webcam.s1: トップページで「Webcam」を選択
webcam.s3_1: メガネ、帽子を取って顔の全体がはっきり見えるようにしてください。
webcam.s3_2: ガイドに合わせて顔を固定してください。
webcam.s3_3: 髪の毛が顔にかからないよう、顔を明るく照らしてください。
webcam.s4: ガイド表示に顔をあわせる
webcam.s5: 顔が認識されると Deja vu 開始

photo.title: 写真アップロードでの体験方法
photo.s1: トップページで「Photo」を選択
photo.s2: 写真アップロード準備
photo.s2_0: 下記のような写真をアップロードしてください。
photo.s2_1: メガネ、帽子は被らず顔の全体がはっきり見える写真
photo.s2_2: 正面を向き、顔がまっすぐ固定された写真
photo.s2_3: 髪の毛が顔にかかっていない、顔が明るく照らされた写真
photo.s3: 写真ファイルをドラッグ＆ドロップするか、クリックで選択しアップロード
